testcase.classname: feature to test the Confirm Booking functionality
testcase.name: To validate that the user is able to confirm order
testcase.system-out: Given User have completed filling order details till payment information....passed And user is on checkout page - confirm order part...........................passed When user clicks the Confrim button.........................................passed Then user is navigated to the order processed page..........................passed And page displays Thankyou and order Note...................................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test the Confirm Booking functionality
testcase.name: To validate that the user is able to download the receipt
testcase.system-out: Given User have completed buying process....................................passed And user is on order details page...........................................passed When user clicks the PDF Invoice button.....................................passed Then system downloads the respected order details pdf.......................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test the Confirm Booking functionality
testcase.name: To validate that the user is able to print the receipt
testcase.system-out: Given User have completed the buying process................................passed And user is on the order details page.......................................passed When user clicks the Print button...........................................passed Then system navigates the user to print application.........................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test the Confirm Booking functionality
testcase.name: To validate that the user is able to edit the order details
testcase.system-out: Given User should have placed order.........................................passed And user is on specific order details page..................................passed When user clicks the Edit Details button....................................passed Then system navigates user to the respected order details edit page.........passed

testcase.classname: feature to test the Confirm Booking functionality
testcase.name: To validate that the user is able to cancel the order
testcase.system-out: Given User have completed the order placing process.........................passed And user is on cancelling order details page................................passed When user clicks the Cancel Order button....................................passed Then user is navigated to the order cancellation page.......................passed
